name: All that glistens is not gold
name_original: All that glistens is not gold
description:
Background

Young adventurer. In the prime of your life. You wake up in a mysterious dungeon dimly lit. You have no idea how, where or what you are doing here.
You look around the room trying to find your way out. The only exit, a doorway blocked by a portcullis.
Out of nowhere a mystrious voice speaks to you.
Beat the deities game. Escape the dungeon. Win back your freedom.

Developer

This game is my first ever game jam. I have created a few other little project but never have I released any games I've made nor taken part in any game jam. So I am very exited. If you did enjoy it, please let me know! Thanks for playing!

I have practiced and attempted so many new things in this game. From multiple cutscenes, baked lighting, particles and more. I hope you like it. If you do have any tips to improve my lighting. Please let me know. Its the one area I consider myself to be the weakest in :(
